sentences.en: Art should bring emotion that can topple tyranny.
sentences.cn: 艺术应该带来能够推翻暴政的情感.

sentences.en: Attacking the buffalo from every direction the pride works together to topple its quarry.
sentences.cn: 狮群从各个方向攻击这头水牛,一起合力掀翻它们的猎物.

sentences.en: He just released his hold and toppled slowly backwards.
sentences.cn: 他就松手，慢慢地向后倒下了。

sentences.en: He slapped his knee and began to topple from his seat.
sentences.cn: 他拍膝盖,开始在座位上昏昏沉沉地倒下去.

sentences.en: How can we topple the chief from his position of trust?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能把主任从他的位置上赶下台?

sentences.en: I saw the small girl topple over and hit her head.
sentences.cn: 我看见那小女孩栽了一跤,碰着了头.

sentences.en: Iron mined in order to topple trees for lumber.
sentences.cn: 开采铁矿则是为了砍伐树木以获取木材.

sentences.en: It could prevent from dust , dirty as well as topple down.
sentences.cn: 以快节奏,高效率的工作特性赢得客户们的高度赞赏.

sentences.en: Pay special attentionto columns, which are the key to having a building sway rather than topple.
sentences.cn: 特别要注意柱体, 它们是使建筑摇而不塌的关键.

sentences.en: That Building is going to topple down.
The house threatened to topple over.
THE LAND WILL BE SUNDERED , SEAS WILL RISE , AND MOUNTAINS TOPPLE.
sentences.cn: 大地崩裂, 海水上涨, 山峦倾倒.

sentences.en: The monkeys shake the trees, trying to topple the nuts from the branches.
sentences.cn: 猴子遥晃著树, 想把坚果从树上摇下来.

sentences.en: The structure playfully feels as though it defies gravity and may topple.
sentences.cn: 好像屋顶是反重力的,随时可能倒下.

sentences.en: The tree is so badly damaged they are worried it might topple over.
sentences.cn: 这棵树严重受损，他们担心它会倒掉。

sentences.en: This scandal could topple the government.
sentences.cn: 这一丑闻可能使政府倒台。

sentences.en: To topple, as from power or a high position; fall.
sentences.cn: 下跌因外力或从高处倒下; 倒下.

trans.tran_en: to become unsteady and then fall over, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 倾倒，摇摇欲坠，倾斜得好像要跌倒一样
